Name: ROHIT SOLANKI
Review:
Bluetooth Calling Is Not Good....üò†üò†üò†
Fireboltt Ring Smart Watch (Step By Step)1. Bluetooth Calling - Bluetooth Calling bahut bekar he phone ko hath me rakhna padta hai ni to call disconnect hoti he agar pocket me rakhi ho to & contact only 8 hi save hote he us se jyada nahi kar sakte2. Speaker - Speaker loud hai par clear nahi hai ear ko pain karte he thoda bahut3. Sensers - Senser bilkul bhi accurate nahi hai. Flat surface par bhi reading show hoti he3.Build Quality - Straps replacable hai but iske straps milege nahi kahi pe and grey mat order krna white colour ki watch bhejege grey ke nam pe4. Battery Life - Battery ok hai not so bad not so good wala situation haiDisplay - Display bahut bekar hai. Colour accuracy ekdum zero lagi vibrant colour nahi hai fade lagte he dekhne me aur thoda pixlate bhi heFinel Verdict - 4000/- ki range me watch thik he par bluetooth range bht kam hai aur speaker bilkul bhi acche ni he loud he bas clear nahi- Rohit Solanki, Ajmer (Raj.)

Name: Mukesh kumar patel
Review:
product k gun - avgun jo mujhe laga mere hisab se!
camera me pro mode k fiction bahut hi limited hain!so i have to click photos in auto mode.2ndstock android nahi hone k karan ui me bahut sare changes karne pade settings sudharne k baad battery backup achchha diya!processor thik hai naye naye k hisab se...display dekhne me to badhiya hai but use karne me dikkat hota hai side se pakadne pe V screen pe hath lag jata hai bezzel bahut hi patla hai upar se curves screen protector lagane me V pareshani deta hai side se glass guard upar uth jata hai.patla wala lagao (flexible) to scratch aayega hi!baki chalane me bahut hi smooth hai!pakadne me V maza aata hai!weight V jyada nahi hai!dhyan rakhna siway handset k company ne kisi V cheej pe kharcha nahi kiya hai packing par V nahi!sab ordinary hai!bas handset aur c type charger milega box me!dekhte hain ab kitne din tak sath deta hai!abhi to 1 maheena V nahi hua hai!i hope j series ki tarah jyada hang na ho!

Name: pawan
Review:
I love u samsung
Bahut time pahle maine Samsung ka smartphone liya tha aur wo inta hang karta tha ki kya batau fir maine Kasam kha li ki aj ke baad kabhi Samsung ka phone nahi lunga lekin ab is phone ko lene ke baad main itna khush hu ki bata ni sakta maine mi.realme.poco.infinix.lenovo.vivo sab use kar liye.fir maine Samsung ke phone ki reting dekho fir socha ki le lu finaly maine liya aur ab main itna khush hu ki kya batau chemra.amoled display Dolby Atmos ye mujhe itna bha Gaye ki maza hi a Gaya bahut pyara phone h ye Kasam se pata ni log kaise 1 star de dete h itne ache phone ko agar aap mera mag dekh rahe aur kabhi apne Samsung ka phone ni liya to plz is phone ko ekbar le ke dekho maza a jayega apko

Name: vinod kumar
Review:
Review jarur padna dil se likja he
Aaj poore 2 mahine ho gye phone use karte hue.......bhai iski battery 2 din aaram se chalti he koi dikkat nhi.2.5 ghante me full charge ho jaata he .....Camera samsung ka jaisa suna tha usse bhi acha nikla sample pics share ki he ..Aaj tak koi lag nhi kahi bhi atka nhi koi bhi app use karte waqt crash nhi hui...or 1 phone me hume isse jyada kya chahiye .....pubg 2 ghante me khel leta hu kabhi heat nhi hua...yahi phone mujhse 1 mahine pehle mere bhai ne liya tha china boycott karne ke liye or use bhi koi dikkat nhi hui..bhaiyo is phone ko jise bhi lena he le lo kisi bhi afwah pe mat jao koi dikkat nhi he mujhe .....processor ko leker me bhi pehle bahut pareshan tha ki kaisa hoga but jab use kiya to pata chala ki sab number game he ...aaj me khul ke keh sakta hu ki SAMSUNG is the beastOr mujhe review likhne ke paise bhi nhi mile jo me kuch bhi likh do .

Samsung ka UI bekar hai , phone dialing ke time UX designer so gya tha, isse acha toh 10th class ka student UI bana le bhai..Baki sab feature sahi hai 2 saal chalega pakka phir mai Iphone wapas luga abhi paisa nahi hai ok bye

Name: DHAVAL B. PARMAR
Review:
Bakwas phone mat lena
Bilkul bakwas phone he koi bhi mat kharidna. Samsung ki khudki hi application kafi ram khati he. Sirf 18/19 minutes ke video call me hi phone kafi garam hojata he.oue call apne aap kat jata he.phir jabtak aapka phone thanda nahi hota kuchha our chalu bhi nahi karne deta. Mene 4 gb ram vala phone liya he our sirf whatsapp chalatahu our E- paper padhtahu firbhi sirf 300 ya 400 mb hi ram free bata ti he. Our battery to kafi jaldi utar jati he. Charge karte vakht bhi phone kafi garam hojata he. Puri body plastic ki he . PeSe barbaad hogaye. Koi Samsung ka phone mat lena .

Name: P Brundaban Patro

Kya ye custtomerke sath khel nahin hai? Aur is baste agar ham koi msg likhneko chaheto koi facility nahin diajata. Ye harassment nahin hai kya. To fir eiseme eise mobile kharidna hamareliye bekar hojatahai.

Name: Piyush
Review:
Gajab product hai 1200 se niche to koi khaas kami ni.


There is only 1 downside that it does not show how much battery is remaining in the case otherwise no downside. Battery is amazing lasts upto minimum 5 hours on 100% volume and 6-7 hrs on 70-80% volume . Takes 1 hour to chatge the earbuds  . Bass is very impressive and overall sound quality is awesome. But sometimes the battery percentage is not shown fully accurate. By this i mean Ki kabhi kabhi iski battery bhot der tak same hi dikhata rehta h mtlb agr iski battery 1 ghnte me 10% drop hoti h to ye show nhi krta sidha 2ghnte baad 20% battery drop dikhate hai. I hope aap sb smjh gaye honge. Baaki bdhiya product h merko 999 me mil gaya tha iske hisaab se best tws hai is range me . Touch control bhi sahi hai. Agar 1200 tk me mile to bina soche utha lena or agr aapke unit me koi dikkat h to 10 se pehle replace krwa lena . Baaki eksm mast product hai agar aapka piece defective nahi hai to . Bina soche lelo 1200 me to. Agr 1300 me aapko mil rha h to thoda research krlena isse bdhiya koi tws mil jaye shayad. 1200 se niche to gajab ka product hai
